lines.text: You wouldn't go for a kiss, would you?
Men never know what the sea really looks like. Women know. When they've looked out there for years, waitin' for somebody to come back.
When two men agree, one is superfluous.
Take this out and have it filled.

[takes the girl's hand]
I could eat you.
[then looks up to see her for the first time]
But I'm afraid it would take months and months.

[on the phone]
Hello, Thelma, this is Miller. No, I don't want the desk. I want to talk to Phelps.

[after shooting Ben Miller]
How does that feel?
